PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-15682017-12-14
ActCanada Mortgage and Housing Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Employment and Social Development of DEREK BALLANTYNE of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of five years, effective April 29, 2018.
